title: Population of Saba ( Caribbean Netherlands ) 2011 to 2019
summary: In general Number of people has rose over the Year.

Number of people is slightly decreasing from 2013 to 2014, roughly constant from 2014 to 2015, slightly increasing from 2015 to 2016, roughly constant from 2016 to 2017, and finally slightly increasing from 2017 to 2018.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2013 and 2014.
The highest Number of people, of value 2155.0 was reached at Year 2018
Minimum Number of people about 1811.0 was reached at Year 2015
